Key Match Events: The Mets' victory helped them get within a half game of the Braves for the final NL wild-card spot
Luis Severino's strong performance was a key factor in the game
Post-Match Reflections: Carlos Mendoza expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Francisco Lindor competed with Shohei Ohtani in the NL MVP race
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in front of a large home crowd
The Mets reached a season-high 10 games over.500 with the win
